name: Stomatopoda
description:
This is my third released game I made for the 7DFPS Jam!

You play as a Mantis Guardian sent to one of the forgotten caved in shell cities this city has been consumed by an inorganic plague.

Made to be played in one small sitting, no continue button.

Controls -

WASD to move

Space to jump

Shift to Sprint

LMB to use Shockwave attack

RMB to block

E to interact
